Uses of Class
org.hornetq.jms.server.recovery.XARecoveryConfig

Packages that use XARecoveryConfig
org.hornetq.jms.server   
org.hornetq.jms.server.recovery This package is used to locate resources and connectors along the cluster set I - JCA Connection Factories or InBound MDBs will call HornetQRegistryBase::register(XARecoveryConfig) II - For each XARecoveryConfig the RegistryBase will instantiate a ResourceDiscoveryUnit which will connect using that configuration and inform the Registry of any topology members III - For each topology member found on the DiscoveryUnits, the RegistryBase will registry a HornetQResourceRecovery that will exist per server
